about.title: About
paragraphs: Welcome to NCity – Nostalgia project, spin off NC Clan.
Started in 2025 with a mission to remember good old days.

home.title2: Welcome to the NCity Nostalgia Project!
paragraphs: Retro – pixel vibes, neon glow, and CRT screen energy.
Nostalgic – the mixtape of the internet, packed with 90s feels.
Mobile-friendly – plays smooth on any device, just like a tamagochi
Fun! :) – secret levels, easter eggs, and plenty of “GAME ON” moments.
